Posts.Content: karen2009 wrote: Hi, this is only my second time to post on this forum.  This site has been so useful to me.  I had a partial Masectomy and begin 6 weeks of Rad treatment next week.  My question, are there some of you out there who can tell me how the Rads affected the looks/feel of your breast?  My doctor told me that my breast may become larger or smaller; somewhat firmer or very hard; discolored etc.  Any input to prepare me would be appreciated.  Thank you in advance for replying.  By the way, I did have to have a reiencision because they didn't get a clear margin the first time around.   One other question, I've been extremely fatiqued after the second surgery.  Is this unusual?  Karen 2009  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Partial Mas w/Rad final result? karen2009 pj12

Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2009 10:32PM karen2009 wrote: Thanks Tami, I'll try June and July Rads.  I appreciate you taking the time to respond.  Karen
Posts.Title: Partial Mas w/Rad final result? karen2009 pj12
